metadata.title: CVE-2021-37219 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.10.1 Raft RPC layer allowsnon-server agents with a valid certificate signed by the same CA to accessserver-only functionality, enabling privilege escalation. Fixed in 1.8.15,1.9.9 and 1.10.2.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
